name: R5-HealthcareService-R4-HealthcareService
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 HealthcareService into FHIR R4

element.display: The details of a healthcare service available at a location

target.display: The details of a healthcare service available at a location
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService` maps as Equivalent to R4 `HealthcareService`

element.display: Whether this HealthcareService record is in active use

target.display: Whether this HealthcareService record is in active use
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.active` maps as Equivalent to R4 `HealthcareService.active`

element.display: If an appointment is required for access to this service

target.display: If an appointment is required for access to this service
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.appointmentRequired` maps as Equivalent to R4 `HealthcareService.appointmentRequired`

element.display: Times the healthcare service is available (including exceptions)
Broad category of service being performed or delivered

target.display: Broad category of service being performed or delivered
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.category` maps as Equivalent to R4 `HealthcareService.category`

element.display: Collection of characteristics (attributes)

target.display: Collection of characteristics (attributes)
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.characteristic` maps as Equivalent to R4 `HealthcareService.characteristic`

element.display: Additional description and/or any specific issues not covered elsewhere

target.display: Additional description and/or any specific issues not covered elsewhere
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.comment` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `HealthcareService.comment` - comment has change due to type change: R5 comment markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 comment

element.display: The language that this service is offered in

target.display: The language that this service is offered in
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.communication` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `HealthcareService.communication` - communication changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Official contact details for the HealthcareService
Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `HealthcareService.contained`

element.display: Location(s) service is intended for/available to

target.display: Location(s) service is intended for/available to
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.coverageArea` maps as Equivalent to R4 `HealthcareService.coverageArea`

element.display: Specific eligibility requirements required to use the service

target.display: Specific eligibility requirements required to use the service
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.eligibility` maps as Equivalent to R4 `HealthcareService.eligibility`

element.display: Coded value for the eligibility

target.display: Coded value for the eligibility
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.eligibility.code` maps as Equivalent to R4 `HealthcareService.eligibility.code`

element.display: Describes the eligibility conditions for the service

target.display: Describes the eligibility conditions for the service
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.eligibility.comment` maps as Equivalent to R4 `HealthcareService.eligibility.comment`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.eligibility.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `HealthcareService.eligibility.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.eligibility.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `HealthcareService.eligibility.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.eligibility.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `HealthcareService.eligibility.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

target.display: Technical endpoints providing access to electronic services operated for the healthcare service
target.comment: R5 `HealthcareService.endpoint` maps as Equivalent to R4 `HealthcareService.endpoint`
